about_the_game:
You are food.

As a Helminth—a native inhabitant of the depths of one of Jupiter's moons—you and your brothers, sisters, and offspring provide humans a lot of protein. And yes, you are tasty. But do you want to end up in the stomach of a gluttonous humans? Or will you find a way out?

Gameplay

The Helminths is a linear platformer set within a vast mining complex that produces the galaxy's most delicious canned food. The unfortunate part? You're the main ingredient. Uncover the secrets of this industrial complex, where Helminths are mined, processed and canned. Navigate the deadly human facility by mastering precision platforming and environmental puzzle-solving to achieve your escape.

Be the hunter, not the prey

Control each character you encounter through the unique ability to penetrate bodies. Use different character abilities to avoid obstacles, fight... Or use them as a trampoline for higher jumps. Whether you're slipping past guards unnoticed or taking control workers to access restricted areas, strategic use of this power is essential for your escape.

Key Features

  • 60+ levels combining fast-paced action with environmental puzzles

  • Control each character and use their unique abilities

  • Explore a dark dystopian vision of the future in an industrial complex on an alien planet

  • Handcrafted 2D pixel art graphics and dynamic lights

content_descriptors.notes: The game features scenes of violence in a pixel-art minimalist form.

short_description: The Helminths is a 2D pixel art platformer that pays homage to classic games and blending environmental puzzles, precision platforming, and fast-paced action. Confront the grim realities of exploitation in dystopian sci-fi world and embark on a dark journey of survival.
